name: L Lawliet
description: Leader of the Kira Task Force.Considered to be the world's greatest detective and a selectively powerful trump card for the government.

name: Light Yagami
description: Light is characterized as hardworking, talented, and a natural genius.Problem-solving skills, Light is a skilled planner and good at mapping out scenarios.

name: Misa Amane
description: Misa is a short, slender, attractive young woman with long, straight, golden-blonde hair.She also often wears blue contact lenses.

name: Shinigami
description: Shinigami vary widely in appearance, and their bodies are built in ways that would seem impossible by Earthly standards.
